WorkItem.ClosedComment: Per our offline discussion. These properties function like MinDate and MaxDate. They do not reflect the currently displayed date range.
WorkItem.Description:
I found the calendar can not set the DisplayDateStart and DisplayDateEnd property value automaticly, they are remain null except that I set them manual. I think the value of them should change as the NextButton or PriviousButton clicked and the firstdayofweek property will also affect the value.
BTW, the calendar do not support MaxDate and MinDate by now, will they be supported in the future?
WorkItem.Summary: Calendar DisplayDateStart,DisplayDateEnd problem and MaxDate, MinDate support
